Ice Age Baby Adventure is a weird, indie platformer created by developer kypello on itch.io. Known for its surreal visuals, strange characters, and dark humor, it quickly became infamous as a cult internet oddity.

What is Ice Age Baby Adventure?

The game takes players on a bizarre journey through a twisted world populated by unusual figures like Ronald McDonald and a bing bong character. With its nightmarish design and absurd premise, it stands out as one of the most unconventional indie platformers ever made.
